preparation: Add ice to glass, combine Seagram's 7, Sprite and serve.

name: Abbey
preparation: Serve up, add ice into shaker and chill glass. Combine gin, orange juice, lillet, and bitters. Cover shaker and begin to shake for 15 seconds, Pour into chilled stem glass. Garnish with cherry and serve.

name: Absolute Idiot
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Jägermeister, fill with energy drink and serve.

name: Adam & Eve
preparation: Add ice cubes to rocks glass. Combine bourbon, galliano, simple syrup, and bitters. Use spoon to stir until cold and serve.

name: Adios MF (AMF)
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Gin, Rum, Tequila, Blue Curacao, then add Sweet and Sour Mix, and top with Sprite. Garnish with Lemon wedge and serve.

name: Adonis
preparation: Serve up, add ice into shaker and chill glass. Combine dry sherry, sweet vermouth, and bitters. Cover shaker and begin to shake for 40 seconds, Pour into chilled stem glass. Garnish with orange peel and serve.

name: Alabama Slammer
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Sloe Gin, Southern Comfort, Amaretto, then Orange Juice. Garnish with Cherry and serve.

name: Alaskan Iced Tea
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Rum, Gin, Vodka, Blue Curacao, Sweet and Sour mix. Fill with Sprite, garnish with Lemon and serve.

name: Alien Secretion
preparation: Add ice to shaker, combine Malibu, Midori, Pineapple, shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Amaretto Sour
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Amaretto, Sweet and Sour Mix, garnish with cherry and serve.

name: Apple Cider Mojito
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Rum with the Apple cider and lemon juice. Garnish with Mint and Apple Slice on rim along with a Cinnamon Stick.

name: Apple Cider Old Fashioned
preparation: Combine whiskey, apple cider, sugar cube, and bitters. Stir with a Cinnamon Stick, garnish with Apple Slice on rim and serve.

name: Apple Jolly Rancher
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Midori, Sweet and Sour Mix and Cranberry Juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve

name: Apple Martini
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Sour Apple Pucker, Sweet and Sour Mix. Shake and strain or stir until chilled, garnish with cherry and serve up.

name: Bahama Mama
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine in glass Coconut Rum, Crème de Banana, Myers Rum, Pineapple Juice, and Orange Juice. Float Grenadine on top, garnish with Cherry and serve

name: Basil Smash
preparation: Tear four basil leaves in thirds and add to cocktail shaker. Then add gin, simple syrup, and lemon juice into the shaker with ice. Seal and shake until cocktail is cold. Pour cocktail into Highball glass and add ice if needed, but leave room to top with club soda. Garnish with basil leaf and lemon wheel, serve chilled.

name: Bay Breeze
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Cranberry Juice, Pineapple Juice and serve.

name: Bee's Knees
preparation: Combine gin and honey in cocktail shaker and stir with spoon until honey is thoroughly mixed. Add lemon juice and ice to shaker and shake until cocktail is cold. Strain into chilled stem glass, garnish with lemon peel and serve.

name: Bijou
preparation: Combine all ingredients in mixing glass. Add ice and stir until drink becomes cold. Strain into chilled stem glass and garnish with a cherry, lemon spiral, or both.

name: Black Russian
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Kahlua, with the Milk and serve.

name: Bloody Mary
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka with Bloody Mary Mix, add in celery stick, garnish with lime and serve.

name: Blow Job
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Baileys, and Kahlua. Shake and strain into shot glass. Top with Whipped Cream and serve.

name: Blue Hawaiian
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Coconut Rum, Sweet and Sour Mix, Pineapple Juice, and Blue Curacao. Stir, garnish with cherry and serve.

name: Blue Kamikazes
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Blue Curacao, and Lime juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Bob Marley
preparation: Layer Crème de Banana, Green Crème de Menthe, then Grenadine into shot glass and serve.

name: Brain Tumor
preparation: Layer Sambuca, then Baileys into shot glass. Grenadine drop for visual effect.

name: Brandy Alexander
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Brandy, Dark Crème de Cacao, and Milk. Stir and serve.

name: Buttery Nipple
preparation: Layer Butterscotch Schnapps, then Baileys into shot glass and serve.

name: Cadillac Margarita
preparation: Rub a Lime wedge along the rim of glass and add salt to rim. Add ice to glass. Combine Tequila, Lime Juice, Cointreau, and Sweet and Sour Mix. Float Grand Marnier on top, garnish with lime wedge and serve.

name: Cajun Martini
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Pepper Vodka, and Dry Vermouth. Shake and strain into glass. Garnish with Jalapeno Slice and serve up.

name: Cape Cod
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka and Cranberry Juice. Garnish with Lime wedge and serve.

name: Caramel Apple Martini
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Carmel Vodka, Apple Cider, and Butterscotch Schnapps. Shake and strain into glass rimmed with cinnamon sugar and serve.

name: Catus Cooler
preparation: Pour energy drink into pint glass. Combine Orange Vodka and Peach Schnapps into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the Pint glass and drink immediately.

name: Cherry Bomb
preparation: Pour energy drink into pint glass. Combine Cherry Vodka and Grenadine into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the Pint glass and drink immediately.

name: Chocolate Cake
preparation: Rub lemon along rim of glass. Add ice to shaker. Combine Vanilla Vodka and Frangelico. Shake and strain into sugar coated glass and serve.

name: Colorado Bulldog
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Kahlua, and Cream. Float Coca-Cola on top and serve.

name: Cool Aid
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Melon Liqueur, Amaretto, and Cranberry Juice then shake and serve.

name: Corkscrew
preparation: Add ice to Shaker. Combine Rum, Peach Schnapps, and Dry Vermouth. Shake and strain into chilled glass and serve.

name: Cosmopolitan
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Triple Sec, Lime Juice, and Cranberry Juice. Shake and Strain into glass. Garnish with Lime Wedge and serve.

name: Cranberry Kamikaze
preparation: Add ice to Shaker. Combine Cranberry Vodka, Triple Sec, and Sweetened Lime Juice. Shake. Strain into shot glasses and serve.

name: Cuba Libre
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Rum and Coco-Cola. Garnish with Lime wedge and serve.

name: Cum Shot
preparation: Layer Tuaca then Baileys into shot glass and serve.

name: Daiquiri
preparation: Rub a Lime wedge along rim of glass and add sugar to edge. Add ice to blender. Combine Light Rum, Lime Juice, and Simple Syrup. Blend until smooth. Pour into glass garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

name: Dirty Martini
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka or Gin, Dry Vermouth, and Olive Juice. Shake and strain into glass. Garnish with an Olive and serve up.

name: Electric Lemonade
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Rum, Blue Curacao, Sweet and Sour Mix, and Sprite. Garnish with Lemon wedge and serve.

name: French 75
preparation: Combine in glass Gin, Sweet and Sour Mix, then Champagne and serve.

name: Fuzzy Navel
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Peach Schnapps and Orange Juice. Garnish with Orange slice and serve.

name: Gimlet (Vodka)
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Lime Juice, and Simple Syrup. Shake and strain into glass. Garnish with Lime wedge and serve.

name: Gimlet (Gin)
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Gin or Vodka, Lime Juice, and Simple Syrup. Shake and strain into glass. Garnish with Lime wedge and serve.

name: Gin & Tonic
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Gin and Tonic Water. Garnish with lime wedge and serve.

name: Ginger Smash
preparation: In a shaker, muddle the ginger, cranberries and sugar. Add the Gin, Apple Cider, and Lemon Juice and enough ice to fill a rocks glass. Quickly shake and pour into glass. Garnish with grated cinnamon.

name: Grasshopper
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Crème de Menthe, Crème de Cacao, Milk and  serve.

name: Greyhound
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Grapefruit Juice and serve.

name: Gummy Martini
preparation: Add ice to Shaker. Combine Vodka, with dash of Peach Schnapps, Sour Apple Schnapps, and Melon Liqueur. Shake and strain into glass. Garnish with Gummy Candy and serve.

name: Hairy Navel
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Peach Schnapps, and Orange Juice. Garnish with Orange slice and serve.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Orange Juice, then Float Galliano on top. Garnish with Orange slice and serve.

name: Hawaiian Hooker
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Southern Comfort, Amaretto, Pineapple Juice, and Grenadine. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Hollywood
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Peach Schnapps, Chambord, and Pineapple Juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Hound Dog
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Rum, Grapefruit Juice and serve.

name: Hurricane
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Rum, Coconut Rum, Myers Rum, Pineapple Juice, Orange Juice. Then float Grenadine, garnish with Cherry and serve.

name: Irish Car Bomb
preparation: Pour Guinness into pint glass. Combine Baileys and Irish Whiskey into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the Pint glass and drink immediately.

name: Irish Coffee
preparation: Fill glass with hot water to pre-heat. Leave in glass for 30 seconds then empty. Combine sugar cubes and hot coffee into glass, stirr until sugar is dissolved. Pour irish whiskey on top to desired taste. Add heavy whipping cream into shaker and shake vigorously until it has transfromed into whipping cream with soft peaks. Layer whipping cream on top by pouring over the convex side of a spoon.

name: Jack and Coke
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Jack Daniels, Coca-Cola, and serve.

name: Jager Bomb
preparation: Pour energy drink into pint glass. Pour Jagermeister into shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the Pint glass and drink immediately.

name: John Daly
preparation: Add ice to Shaker. Combine Vodka, Iced Tea, and Lemonade. Quick shake and stain into glass over ice and serve.

name: Jolly Rancher
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Sweet and Sour, and Cranberry juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Kamikazes
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Triple Sec, and Lime juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Keoke Coffee
preparation: Pour into Coffee Mug, Kahlua, Baileys, Crème de Cacao, top with Coffee, and serve.

name: Kir Royale
preparation: Pour Champagne, then float Chambord, and serve.

name: Kool Aide
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Amaretto, Midori and Cranberry juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: L.S.D.
preparation: Add ice to Shaker. Combine Scotch, Drambuie, and Lemonade. Shake and strain into glass and serve.

name: Leap Frog
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Gin, Lemon Juice, and fill glass with Ginger Ale. Garnish with Lemon and serve.

name: Left Hook
preparation: Combine Southern Comfort and Bourbon into shot glass and serve.

name: Lemon Drop Martini
preparation: Rub a Lemon wedge along rim of glass and add sugar rim. Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Triple Sec, and Sweet and Sour Mix. Shake and strain into glass. Garnish with an Lemon Wedge and serve.

name: Liquid Cocaine
preparation: Combine Jägermeister, High Proof Rum, Rumplemintz, and serve.

name: Long Beach Iced Tea
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Gin, Rum, Tequila, Triple Sec, then add Sweet and Sour Mix, and top with Cranberry Juice. Garnish with Lemon wedge and serve.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Gin, Rum, Tequila, Triple Sec, then add Sweet and Sour Mix, and top with Coca-Cola. Garnish with Lemon wedge and serve.

name: Lynchburg Lemonade
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Jack Daniels, Triple Sec, Sweet and Sour Mix, and Sprite. Garnish with Lemon wedge and serve.

name: Madras
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Cranberry Juice, and Orange Juice. Garnish with Lime wedge and serve.

name: Mai Tai
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Light Rum, Coconut Rum, Grenadine, Pineapple Juice, and Orange Juice. Float Mayers rum on top, garnish with Cherry and serve.

name: Bitter Mai Tai
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Light Rum, Coconut Rum, Spiced Rum, Lime Juice, Pineapple Juice, and POG Juice. Float Bitters on top, garnish with Cherry, Pineapple skewer and serve.

name: Manhattan
preparation: Serve up or on the rocks. Add ice into shaker or glass, combine bourbon, sweet vermouth, and bitters. Use spoon to stir until cold. Garnish with cherry and serve.

name: Margarita
preparation: Rub a Lime wedge along the rim of glass to add salt. Add ice to glass. Combine Tequila, Triple Sec, Lime Juice, and Sweet and Sour Mix. Garnish with lime wedge and serve.

name: Martini
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka or Gin, and Dry Vermouth. Shake and strain into glass. Garnish with an Olive or Lemon twist and serve.

name: Melon Balls
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Midori, and Orange juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Melon Hopper
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Midori, White Crème de Cacao, Milk and  serve.

name: Metropolitan
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Triple Sec, Lime Juice, and Cranberry Juice. Shake and strain into glass. Float Chambord on top and serve.

name: Mexican Coffee
preparation: Pour into Coffee Mug, Tequila, Kahlua, top with Coffee, and serve.

name: Midori Sour
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Midori and Sweet and Sour Mix. Garnish with Cherry and serve.

name: Mike Collins
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Sweet and Sour Mix, and Sprite. Garnish with a Cherry, Lime wedge and serve.

name: Mimosa
preparation: Pour Champagne into Glass, top with Orange Juice, and serve.

name: Mind Eraser
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Kahlua, Soda water, and serve.

name: Mint Julep
preparation: Muddle mint and sugar in bottom of glass with Splash of water. Then add ice to the glass. Combine Bourbon and fill with Club soda. Garnish with Lime wedge and serve.

name: Mojito
preparation: Muddle mint and sugar in bottom of glass with Splash of Lime Juice. Then add ice to the glass. Combine Rum and fill with Club soda. Garnish with Lime wedge and serve.

name: Moscow Mule
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Ginger Beer, and Lime Juice. Garnish with Lime wedge and serve.

name: Mudslides
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Baileys, and Kahlua. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Muscle Beach
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Triple Sec, fill with Pink Lemonade and serve.

name: Negroni
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Gin, Sweet Vermouth, and Campari. Shake and strain into glass and serve.

name: New York Slammer
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Whiskey, Banana Liqueur, Slow Gin, then Orange Juice and serve.

name: New York Sour
preparation: Add ice to Shaker. Combine Whiskey, Sweet and Sour Mix, then layer red wine on top garnish with cherry and serve.

name: Nutty Irishman
preparation: Pour into Coffee Mug, Irish Whiskey, Frangelico, top with Coffee, and serve.

name: Oatmeal Cookie
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Jägermeister, Baileys, Butterscotch Schnapps, and Goldshlagger. Shake and strain into glass and serve.

name: Old Fashioned
preparation: Stir Sugar and bitters with splash of water until sugar is dissolved. Add Whiskey then ice and continue to stir until cooled. Strain into glass and 1 large ice cube. Garnish with a Cherry and Orange slice and serve.

name: Orgasm
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Kahlua, Amaretto, Baileys, Milk and serve.

name: Panty Dropper
preparation: Add ice to Glass. Combine Vodka, Coffee Liqueur, Sloe Gin, then Fill Glass with milk. Shake, garnish with cherry and serve.

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Frangelico, Chambord, and Baileys. Shake and Strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Pink Lady
preparation: Add all ingredients into a shaker. Dry shake without ice for at least one minute. Then add ice and shake for an additional minute and strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with cherries.

name: Pumpkin Caipirinha
preparation: Muddle the lime, agave nectar, and fresh ginger in the bottom of a cocktail shaker. Add Cachaca, Pumpkin puree, and ice. Shake until thoroughly mixed and chilled. Strain into a glass filled with ice, and garnish with grated nutmeg and a lime wheel.

name: Pumpkin Fever
preparation: Combine Pumpkin Liqueur, Rum, Milk, and Cream into a shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Sprinkle ground Cinnamon and serve.

name: Pumpkin Spice Margarita
preparation: Add ice to a martini shaker. Shake ingredients and strain into a chilled cocktail glass over ice. Garnish with an orange twist and add a pinch of cinnamon and serve.

name: Pumpkin Old Fashioned
preparation: Combine pumpkin puree, bourbon, syrup, Grand Marnier and bitters in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain through a fine strainer into a chilled old-fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with orange peel and serve.

name: Pumpkin Pie Martini
preparation: Add ice to a shaker. Combine all ingredients then Shake and strain into large martini glass rimmed with crushed graham crackers. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Pumpkin Spice
preparation: Combine pumpkin puree, Vodka, Lime Juice, and Honey Water(equal parts honey and water) in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into Tall glass with fresh ice. Garnish with a long slice of ginger and serve.

name: Pumpkin Spice White Russian
preparation: For the Rim:On a shallow plate, combine pumpkin pie spice and crushed graham crackers. Dip the edge of each glass in water, then into the mixture, coating the edge of each glass. Combine Vodka and Kahlua into a glass filled with ice. Top with the Pumpkin Spice Creamer. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a sprinkle of pumpkin pie spice.

name: Purple Hooter
preparation: Add ice to Shaker. Combine Vodka, Chambord, and Sweet and Sour Mix. Shake and stain into shot glass and serve.

name: Raspberry Kamikazes
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Chambord, and Lime juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Rattlesnake
preparation: Add the whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup, absinthe and egg white to a shaker. Dry shake for at least 1 minute. Add ice and continue shaking for another minute. Strain into a chilled glass, and enjoy.

name: Red Headed Slut
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Jägermeister, Peach Schnapps, and Cranberry juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Rob Roy
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Scotch, and Sweet Vermouth. Stir until chilled. Garnish with Cherry and serve.

name: Sangria
preparation: Add Red or White Wine to glass. Add Orange and Pineapple Juice. Top with Soda water. Garnish with various fruits and serve.

name: Scooby Snack
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Malibu, Midori, and Pineapple Juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Scotch and Soda
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Scotch, Soda water, and serve.

name: Screaming Orgasm
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Kahlua, Amaretto, Baileys, Milk and  serve.

name: Screwdriver
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Orange Juice, and serve.

name: Sea Breeze
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Cranberry Juice, Grapefruit Juice, and serve.

name: Separator
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Kahlua, Brandy, Milk, and serve.

name: Sex on the Beach
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Peach Schnapps, Orange Juice, Cranberry Juice, and serve.

name: Side Car
preparation: Rub a Lemon wedge along rim of glass and add sugar rim. Add ice to shaker. Combine Brandy, Triple Sec, and Sweet and Sour Mix. Shake and strain into glass serve.

name: Singapore Sling
preparation: Add Sugar to Shaker with Lemon Juice. Muddle, then add ice and Gin. Shake and strain into chilled glass. Float Cherry Brandy on top. Garnish with Cherry, Lemon and serve.

name: Slient Knight
preparation: Add ice to Shaker. Combine Whiskey, Peach Schnapps, and Cranberry Juice. Shake and serve over ice.

name: Slippery Nipple
preparation: Layer Sambuca, then Baileys into shot glass and serve.

name: Sloe Comfortable screw
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Sloe Gin, Southern Comfort, and Orange Juice. Garnish with a Cherry and serve.

name: Sloe Dog
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Sloe Gin, Grapefruit Juice and serve.

name: Strawberry Rose Fizz
preparation: Add the egg whites to your shaker and shake for 10 seconds with no ingredients. In another shaker muddle strawberries and vodka, then combine remaining ingredients except club soda. Give a little shake and pour into the egg whites shaker, then add ice and shake vigorously for a full 30 seconds. Fill glass with ice and add club soda, then strain your cocktail into the glass and garnish with a rose petal and straw.

name: Surfers on Acid
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Jägermeister, Malibu, and Pineapple Juice. Shake and strain into shot glass.

name: Tequila Sunrise
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Tequila, and Orange Juice. Float Grenadine on top, garnish with a Cherry and serve.

name: Tequila Sunset
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Tequila, and Grapefruit Juice. Float Blackberry Liqueur on top, garnish with a Cherry and serve.

name: The Northern Spy
preparation: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.Shake, and strain into a small cocktail glass or coupe.Top with cava
name: Toasted Almond
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Kahlua, Amaretto, Milk and serve.

name: Tokyo Tea
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Gin, Rum, Tequila, Triple Sec, then add Sweet and Sour Mix, and top with Midori. Garnish with Lemon wedge and serve.

name: Tom Collins
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Gin, Sweet and Sour Mix, and Sprite. Garnish with a Cherry, Lime wedge and serve.

name: Tool
preparation: Add ice to Shaker. Combine Tequila, Grenadine, Orange Juice, and shake. Stain into glass with ice, then float Southern Comfort on top and serve.

name: Vesper Martini
preparation: Add ice to Shaker and combine all ingredients. Shake and stain into chilled glass, garnish with lemin swirl.

name: Vieux Carre
preparation: Add ice to rocks glass. Combine Whiskey, Cognac, Sweet Vermouth, along with everything else. Use spoon to stir until cold and serve.

name: Washington Apple
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Crown Royal, Apple Puckers, and Cranberry Juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Watermelon Martini
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Midori, and Cranberry Juice. Shake and strain into glass, garnish with Watermelon and serve.

name: Whiskey Sour
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Whiskey and Sweet and Sour Mix. Garnish with Cherry and serve.

name: White Russian
preparation: Add ice to glass. Combine Vodka, Kahlua, Milk, and serve.

name: Woo Woo
preparation: Add ice to shaker. Combine Vodka, Peach Schnapps, and Cranberry Juice. Shake and strain into shot glass and serve.

name: Rye Swizzle
preparation: Combine rye whiskey, ginger syrup, and lemon juice into collins glass. Fill glass with crushed ice and stir. Top off with bitters and garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Blackberry Ombre Sparkler
preparation: Muddle one blackberry, simple syrup, and ice in shaker. Shake until diluted and strain into champagne flute. Pour champagne into glass. Hint: Pour onto the side of the glass for maxiumum speration and ombre effect. Garnish with two blackberries and rosemary.

name: Bellini
preparation: Pour peach puree and presecco at same time into champagne flute. Garnish with peach slices.

name: Turquoise Sip
preparation: Dip rim into water, begin rimming glass with sugar until completely covered. Combine juice and blue curacao. Top off with champagne.

name: Grapefruit & Rosemary Mimosa
preparation: Combine simple syrup, grapefruit, and two sprigs of rosemary into shaker. Add ice to shaker and shake until diluted. Strain into flute and fill with champagne. Granish with remaining rosemary sprig.

name: Champagne Margarita
preparation: Rim glass with sugar. Combine roses lime, tequila, triple sec, and fresh lime into flute. Fill glass with brut and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Ward 8
preparation: Combine all ingredients into a shaker and add ice. Shake ingredients and strain into a chilled glass. Add an ice cube and a splash of sparkling water.

name: Blarney Stone
preparation: Fill a copper mug (or a glass) with ice. Pour whiskey and lime juice over the ice, then fill glass with ginger beer. Garnish with lime twist.

name: Watermelon Julep
preparation: Fill a copper mug with ice. Pour whiskey and lime juice over the ice, then fill glass with ginger beer. Garnish with lime twist.
